DOC.brief_summary: To assess viral load response , safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics multiple oral dos PF 00232798 HIV-positive patient volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study Of PF-00232798 In HIV Positive Patients
DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic HIV1 infect male patient age 18 55 year inclusive . Patients CCR5 tropic virus determine Monogram PhenoSense Entry assay . Patients receive experimental drug within past four month ( prior first dose day study ) previously receive another CCR5 antagonist . Patients evidence decompensated liver disease .
